org.apache.hadoop.ipc

Class Client.ConnectionId

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.ipc.Client.ConnectionId
  • Enclosing class:
    Client

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value={"HDFS","MapReduce"})
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public static class Client.ConnectionId
extends Object
    This class holds the address and the user ticket. The client connections to servers are uniquely identified by
